Class SteepleChaser5_6

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • kareltherobot.UrRobot
        • kareltherobot.Robot
          • Racer
            • SteepleChaser5_6
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, kareltherobot.Directions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DifferentSteeplechaser5_10
    public class SteepleChaser5_6
extends Racer
    The Racer robot runs a one mile long race with hurdles, where wall sections represent hurdles. The hurdles are different sizes and are randomly placed between any two corners in the race course.
    Version:
    06.18.2021
    Author:
    Saloni Shah with assistance from John Page

      • SteepleChaser5_6

        public SteepleChaser5_6​(int street,
                        int avenue,
                        kareltherobot.Directions.Direction direction,
                        int beepers)
        Creates a SteepleChaser5_6 object.
        Parameters:
        street - specifies the vertical position on the grid of this robot.
        avenue - specifies the horizontal position on the grid of this robot.
        direction - specifies the direction of this robot.
        beepers - specifies this robot's number of beepers.

    • Method Detail

      • jumpUp

        public void jumpUp()
        Jumps up just past the height of a hurdle.
        Overrides:
        jumpUp in class Racer
        Precondition:
        This robot is at the base of the race with a hurdle directly in front.
        Postcondition:
        This robot is just past the height of a hurdle and facing the end of the race.

      • glideDown

        public void glideDown()
        Glides down the side of the hurdle facing the end of the race.
        Overrides:
        glideDown in class Racer
        Precondition:
        This robot is above and one corner past the hurdle facing th eend of the race.
        Postcondition:
        This robot is one corner past the hurdle, at the base of the race, and facing the end of the race.
